website_summaries.verdict: Easy strap adjustment is a big plus in these swim goggles, which fit most users without leaking, but their biggest kudos revolve around fast-responding customer service.
pros: Users report no leaks or fogging, and no raccoon circles around the eyes after wearing
Strap adjusts at back, rather than the side, which is preferred by some users
cons: Goggles can’t be adjusted for distance between eyes, causing fit issues for some

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!! JUST WOW!!!!
customer_reviews.text: all I can say is Wow!!!! I waited to get into the water today to test these bad boys! and let me tell you they did not disappoint!!!! I was blown away on how clear I could see under water without wearing my glass. Unbelievable!!!! I was in the water for exactly 45 min they were so comfortable, and NEVER FOGGED UP, NOR FILLED UP WITH WATER! Love these things looking forward to many more swims with them! get them!!! and they look beautiful; to!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Renaissance Girl

customer_reviews.title: They don't leak and don't fog up!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Aegend swim goggles to use while practicing kayak rolling. Every other brand I have tried either leaked or fogged up. I was very pleasantly surprised with these. They didn't leak and they remained clear during a two-hour rolling session. And they come with a nice hard case for protecting them. I can't attest to how well they will hold up over time, but so far they out-perform every other brand I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than the big brands!
customer_reviews.text: But these as a gift for my husband, he swims three or four days a week. He’s always been picky about goggles, so I was nervous about getting these for him, but they are excellent and he loves them! I believe I will be buying them again for him .
customer_reviews.author: LAM

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent goggles! No leaks, no fogging up, easily adjustable, very sturdy construction. My husband was skeptical because he said he's NEVER found a pair that didn't leak. Well, he's convinced that these are the real deal. I purchased this because previous reviews mentioned that customer service was excellent. I have not had an issue to contact them yet! You won't regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy K

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to family, friends!
customer_reviews.text: This a quality product by the strictest standards. I have a medium-large face (I am a man), and they fit phenomenally. I have used them for the past two months and they keep growing on me. Awesome job whoever designed these!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: These work great!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a Tough Mudder event- knowing I'd be jumping into ice cold muddy water, and because I wear contacts, I needed good eye protection. I used a different brand last year and muddy water still got inside and I ended up losing a contact halfway through. These goggles were PERFECT. They kept out all water and mud and kept my vision clear throughout the event, They stayed secure and were very comfortable- worked better than I had expected- I'll definitely be keeping these and using them in future events!
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars goggles
customer_reviews.text: Best goggles ever.Own 3 pair and they all fit me perfectly I'm a ocean lifeguard for over 10 years in sunny south Florida and i swim in the ocean almost every day. The mirrored one is awesome looking plus they do a very good job filtering the morning sun glare and i have the clear one for the cloudy raining days. Read the care instructions don't rub the inside of the goggles and they'll never fog up. Plus they came in a nice case.
customer_reviews.author: luiz

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles! My kids (6 and 7) wore these ...
customer_reviews.text: Great goggles! My kids (6 and 7) wore these for their first swim meet last night and they said they worked great. They fit well, look adorable and my son is in love with the case they come in. Great purchase! These were recommended by a friend whose son has been using them for a long time. Great recommendation and an awesome price. I don't think these can be beat. We're very satisfied and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MommaCX3 ☀️❤️

customer_reviews.title: Giddy for these Goggles
customer_reviews.text: Great goggles for swimming. My eyes were feeling dry after swimming in the community center pool. I thought these would help. I was not disappointed! Great fit and seal immediately without having to fuss with adjustments. I could feel the seal grip my skin, I put them on dry. No leaks or discomfort as I swam the crawl back and forth in the pool for 30 minutes. The case was a nice surprise too. Very sturdy with a twist lock feature that keeps the goggles in the case while they get transported in your gym bag. I also use the case as a stand to dry the goggles after rinsing them at home.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES LOSCH

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yr old son had so much trouble with his Speedo goggles; there were uncomfortable, hard to see out of, and always let water in. These are awesome, fit his eyes perfectly, he does not have to adjust constantly and he says they are comfortable (though they do leave rings around his eyes still). The case is great and I would definitely recommend for children that do a lot of swimming!
customer_reviews.author: KD3

customer_reviews.title: I will recommended to my friends to buy this so wonderful I think
customer_reviews.text: I am really satisfied and so happy with the purchase of this swimming Googgles it can fit with many kind of head or face thanks to its sturdy locking buckle and easy to adjust width. Water-repellent and anti-fogging glasses with tight fitting around the eyes prevent water from leaking into your eyes no matter how long you swim. I can always Eyes wide open while swimming. I have bought many times those items from this brand of Aegend a for my family live in Vietnam and in USA and I have recommended to my friends to buy and they are also very satisfied. I will continue to buy these products from Aegend in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Tran Thi Thu Huong

customer_reviews.title: They're nice, work well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kids. They're nice, work well. I like that they come in a case so it makes for safer transport when traveling. If you take care of them (bring them out of the sun, rinse after swimming, and don't touch the insides) they last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: It’s a very good price, and the sun doesn’t bother me anymore while I m swimming!!
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly and I like the fact that the water doesn’t get inside while I m swimming.
customer_reviews.author: MHJL

customer_reviews.title: Blurry Vision Underwater!! Get the flat lens version
customer_reviews.text: Update** Aegend has wonderful customer service and they quickly sent me a “flat lens” version. The new goggles are great with clear vision. Save yourself time and avoid the gamble, just order the flat lenses version also sold on Amazon. They have the same case, same strap, same shape, just with flat lenses. I would not hesitate to order from Aegend again. **Original review**Great looking goggles that come in a great case, but they have a major problem. Underwater your vision is blurry!! Very blurry, almost like opening your eyes underwater without goggles. Above water, our vision was fine, but underwater it goes bad. My whole family tried them with the same results. Very weird. We tried the mirrored version.
customer_reviews.author: Moon Base

customer_reviews.title: Not at all as described.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 pair of these based on the description that they were leak proof and fog proof. I bought a set each for my 10 year old, 13 year old, my husband and myself. Each set was a different color. Every single one leaked and fogged. Mine fogged up within 2-3 minutes use. The 10 year old's leaked so badly she couldn't use them no matter how we adjusted them. Very disappointed. Returned all 4.
customer_reviews.author: K.Holzer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money! Broke on 2nd use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 pair of these for my kiddos after reading so many positive reviews. My kids are 9 and the twins are 6. I loved the release latch on the back especially for girls and their hair. However, the second time we used them, they broke! The 2nd pair broke on the 3rd use. My sons are still good but I’m so disappointed. What a waste of money and disappointment to my girls. I assumed with that cool case and proper care they’d last at least the remainder of summer. Very very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Bethumms

customer_reviews.title: great goggles
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my almost 9 yr old grandson who has just started swimming on in a swim club and does quite a bit of summer swimming. He absolutely loved them, and looks pretty cool in them. The quality of the goggles seems to be well constructed and sturdy. They adjust quite a bit so I am confident he will be able to adjust them as needed.
customer_reviews.author: jk49

customer_reviews.title: Sorry to say, but this is the only pair ...
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say, but this is the only pair of swim goggles I have ever bought that were blurry to look through underwater. It was the same view you get without goggles (when you open your eyes underwater). Threw them away and kept the case for my other goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Barbra J. Boutin

customer_reviews.title: Great for one week then fogged up
customer_reviews.text: I have updated my rating because this is a fantastic company who cares about their customers. They have offered to replace the defective goggles free of charge and so with that I change my rating because great companies who care about their customers are hard to come by these days. Thank you! Bought these goggles for lap swimming. They were great for week one. After one week they started to fog up a lot. I never rubbed the lenses which could cause the film to wear off so not sure what happened. But for the first week they were awesome so three stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Not for indoors, major leaks and fogging, non adjustable nose strap
customer_reviews.text: There are some serious liars writing reviews or people are just getting lucky because these goggles are awful. They are for OUTDOOR swimming only not indoors—it’s like wearing sunglasses and they are too dark. They absolutely do fog, a lot, so no idea who is saying there’s dont. They have horrible suction and do leak, so again, who is writing these raving reviews? The nose is NOT adjustable and the goggles are suited for eyes more wide apart. All in all this product is a 0/5. Very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Best goggles ever!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I found these! I usually spend the first 10 minutes of my swim messing with getting my goggles to seal correctly on my face. Annoying in the pool, but terrible on open water swims! Even so I tend to have to suction them so tightly to my face I get a headache. These seal SO WELL! there is NO water in them at all. AND I don't have to make them so tight that I end up with raccoon eyes afterwards. Best goggle purchase to date! I also have had no issue with fog at all (I usually do the lick, rinse, then put on trick). Highly recommend these and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kera E

customer_reviews.title: Strap clip breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: The clip on the head strap broke on my first pair after a few months last summer. I figured that for the price, I could live with that happening again this summer. But my second pair broke in the same place after three swims. Two stars for the suction and comfort, but definitely will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L. Rippetoe

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: The main purpose I purchased the goggles was to keep my eyes dry post surgery. For some stupid reason I rinsed them off first so they wouldn't fog while in the shower which was totally unnecessary. Therefore I had to keep the operative eye shut so the water droplets wouldn't get inside that eye. I'll know better for the future. Other that my mistake, the goggles worked great. I was able to wash my hair and face without any water seeping inside the goggles. For my situation I would recommend them. By the way, a nurse suggested using the goggles so the credit goes to her.
customer_reviews.author: Myra J.

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by how well these work.
customer_reviews.text: Incredible value for these. The suction is strong and these are quite comfortable. The only complaint I have is how the nose bridge touches my nose. I might just need to adjust the way that I'm wearing them but it does bother me after prolonged use. These would be perfect if the material on the nose bridge was a little softer. despite this I will absolutely give this product five stars in highly recommended. The UV protection is a nice touch as well. Probably one of the nicer touches is the hard case these come with. It's great to have something that actually protects these from getting scratched up during storage.
customer_reviews.author: Primal Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles at a good price
customer_reviews.text: This is about the fourth pair of goggles I’ve purchased in the past 9 months. All have been approximately the same price range. Hands down, this model is the best! I love the closure device that allows them to be snug without squeezing your brains out. The suction is adequate for me to swim laps every day without them being too tight. Many goggles have to be worn super tight with suction that actually gives me a headache and eye pain. These do NOT do that. I get a tiny amount of fogging after about 45 minutes, but that is far superior to other models I’ve used. I’m really happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: deademafmf

customer_reviews.title: Swim goggles
customer_reviews.text: I bought this swimming goggles by reading all these reviews but completely disappointed. I followed all the instructions properly but still the lenses are getting foggy. Initially I thought, I am doing some mistakes but each time I was getting same issue. And the water was also going inside the glasses; which makes extremely difficult to swim. I need to stop my lap in the middle to remove water. But the design and look is good of this goggle. Updated: Aegend customer support contacted me and provided a replacement goggles which worked perfectly for me.
customer_reviews.author: AKumar

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable -  not fog or leak free
customer_reviews.text: Not leak proof. Not fog proof. The one positive I can say is that I like the large rubber gaskets around the eyes. But, the plastic device on the back always catches in my hair and pulls. Not fun I was really hoping these would be as nice to own as they are to look at it. Not the case. I've been swimming all my life - and these look like a Ferrari, but run like a Ford Pinto.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonflyfuzz

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again - But wait!  I WOULD!
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy again. I bought four pair of these for each family member. They skew my vision underwater so significantly that it's distracting. Regular swim masks don't do this to me, in fact I've never seen any do this to anyone. They fog after some time, even with a good seal around my eye sockets. Update: Without solicitation, they sent me a different pair with flat (as opposed to curved) eye pieces and the different is significant and superior. When I put them on, it's almost like wearing my glasses underwater. Actually usable and would recommend but I'm not sure how you find the flat eye version vs. curved.
customer_reviews.author: razenruin

customer_reviews.title: Really nice goggles!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, even with my big nose and wideset eyes. Ok, I'm not a total freak, but on most goggles with replaceable nose bridges I need to use the widest one. So I was a bit apprehensive about these since there is no replacing the bridge. But they are super comfortable. The anti-fog coating works great after the goggles warm up. Now I just have to remember to not wipe them out.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewerman

customer_reviews.title: Learning to swim lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I bought the for my 6 year old son to help him with his goal of conquering his fear of putting his head in water this summer. These have been a tremendous help and worth the extra investment over cheaper goggles. They have not leaked, they adjust easily, they have a clip in the back so he can take them on and off himself easily, he thinks they look cool, and they reduce sun glare while he's out. He had even worn them in the shower once and they helped conquer his fears there. We're still working on the pool, but he's making big strides quickly because these have given him a huge confidence boost.
customer_reviews.author: CatherineTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for contact lens wearers.
customer_reviews.text: These are good for people like me who wear contacts but also like to swim. They look more translucent in the stock photos than in person. The Aqua style is more of a solid yellow metallic tint but they still work and look cooler on than I expected. The suction is great, the straps are adjustable and theres a clip in the back to put them on and take them off without pulling your hair. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crazy awesome seal, but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The upside is that these have an amazing seal on them, the strongest I've ever experienced in a set of goggles. The downside is that it accomplishes this by sucking your eye sockets out of your head. On me, they fit very close to the eyes, above the cheek bone and below the brow bone, but your mileage may differ. If you're a competitive or very experienced swimmer, and a good seal is your top priority, you might be used to this, but I wouldn't recommend these for a casual or beginner swimmer. The return process was fast and easy, though, so there's absolutely no risk in giving them a try to see how they work for you!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: One Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: I bought these goggles for my son who is 13. He loves the fit and the look. He says they are very comfortable and there is a good seal that prevents water from seeping in. I had an issue with the first pair we received and I have to say I am very impressed with the company's customer service. They go the extra mile to make sure their customers are 100% satisfied. I highly recommend these goggles and this company. Thank you so much for your attention to details and your service. Will will definitely come back to shop this brand.
customer_reviews.author: DeniseR

customer_reviews.title: Fancy but questionable
customer_reviews.text: Do not race with cap, slips off easily. LOVE the strap system, but HATE how it’s connected to the goggle itself, it’s doom to fail at some point. Quite dark. Feels amazing, very comfortable. Relay team got different colored goggles and we all went bald. Slipped off during a race (wearing cap) and swam blind into the wall (some how swam straight??)... but dropped 5s and placed 3/8 at sectionals. Wonderful pair of googles, but as an athlete swimmer, would still choose cinch-strap goggles any day just for that 100% non-slip factor and fast readjustment speeds and general reliability. Great goggles for practice though!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Quality, could use some tweaks in the lens design.
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are really well-constructed and you can tell alot of thought went into their design. The case alone is on par with a Tesla design, if they were to get into the goggle case business. It took me a little while to figure out that you have to turn one end to unlock the case 😁. They do seal on to your eyes very well. However, the bevels on the sides of the goggles creates a blurry interference which blocks some of your peripheral vision. If they could make that a smooth rounded edge to expand peripheral vision that would be a great improvement to the design!
customer_reviews.author: Tuffy

customer_reviews.title: ... purchased the mirrored lenses pair but they don't look like the ones in the picture
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the mirrored lenses pair but they don't look like the ones in the picture. In fact, the mirrored ones are the only ones that look different. One of the side straps comes off quite a bit. They're easy to adjust the tightness/looseness. They fog up horribly. I mean... it's annoying. We live at the beach and have yet to find a great pair of goggles that we don't have to buy a new pair again after a couple weeks use. Yes we wet them first. No we don't wipe the lens. Yes we immediately wash them with fresh water after we use them. No luck. We never had any issues with leaking. They came with a case.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Rager

customer_reviews.title: Best goggles we’ve ever had!
customer_reviews.text: These are, without a doubt, the best goggles I have ever purchased for myself and my son. They are extremely comfortable, easy to adjust, don’t fog up, and don’t leak. We’ve used them several times a week all summer and haven’t had a single issue. The case they come with is a super nice touch - makes it easier to just toss them into the pool bag and not have to worry about them getting scuffed up. For your money, you won’t find a better pair of goggles. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leysa

customer_reviews.title: Blurry underwater, no leaks, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: No leaks, no fog, really comfortable but unfortunately they are blurry underwater. They arrived today and I was excited to try them tonight. Unfortunately they didn't live up to the expectations. They didn't leak, they were for sure comfortable, but they were very blurry vision underwater. I compared them with my kids cheap $4 Speedo goggles and their goggles were perfectly clear underwater. Not sure why, maybe I got a bad pair, maybe its the mirrored lenses (which I need because my eyes are sensitive to the bright sun), but they didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: No leakage, then leakage
customer_reviews.text: Very odd. I've used these for about 2 months lap swimming three times a week and they've been great. Comfortable and no leakage. The other day, however, I could not get the suction right and water kept coming in. I would stop after every lap and adjust, but, even after 5 laps of doing this, could not them to stop leaking. Not sure why. So, I went with my other pair. But those make everything blurry under the water. These make everything crystal clear. I'll keep working of them.
customer_reviews.author: WeAreUs

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily (read update)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these goggles 6 months ago. Always Carried them in the proper case and the clasp snapped off. Without the clasp you cannot wear the goggles. With proper care and use goggles should last for years. Do not waste your money on goggles that break so easily. *****UPDATE****** Customer service contacted me right after I posted my complaint about the goggles. They immediately sent out a replacement clasp which arrived 2 days later. The clasp was easy to replace and now the goggles are as good as new. Thank you for your outstanding customer service!!!
customer_reviews.author: MilkToast

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of goggles I ordered. These were perfect size along with several knows adjustable pieces. The only thing that was really dumb in my opinion what is there is no instructions how to take the stupid nose piece out. And it doesn’t just snap out. Had to give them to my husband to figure it out he used little mini screwdrivers to press them out. It’s kind of funny because the paperwork that came with the cockles was fairly useless. I was a little surprised at the manufacture but they are awesome and they were great in there perfectly adjustable around my head.
customer_reviews.author: kelliwho

customer_reviews.title: Can't see in these while swimming so now I'm using my broken goggles over these brand new ones
customer_reviews.text: If you want goggles that may never leak, but don't care about being able to see - these are for you! The first time using them, I immediately understood some of the other reviews - one simply cannot see through them if you look at the wrong angle. When staring down at the bottom of the pool everything is clear, but when titling my head up to swim correctly or do a flip turn, it's like there's some translucent film on that angle of the goggles. After a few swims I gave up and I'm back to using my goggles with the broken straps.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Clear as day
customer_reviews.text: These worked wonderfully for me and helped me see very clearly whilst underwater. They had a good seal and I love that they come with a case. These were the first pair that I purchased for a lifeguard training class, and I'm very glad I chose these. I haven't had to order any other goggles.
customer_reviews.author: MurphsLaw

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but Blurry
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are comfortable except that when you go underwater everything gets blurry. I thought at first I had another protective film on the lenses, which was not the case. I'm surprised that the company would make a product that is meant to be used underwater on your eyes that would give you blurry vision. I am not the only one to experience this. I would suggest purchasing other goggles. Junk. Update: The company had A+ service and took care of me by sending a pair of improved goggles that are not blurry at all.
customer_reviews.author: Joel B.

customer_reviews.title: Very good functional, leak-proof swim goggles
customer_reviews.text: These goggles worked perfectly. Held onto my face without leaking and were easily adjusted to for my daughter as well as her cousins. It was heavily favored over their own individual goggles and was passed around. I had to fight to get it back. The color of the glass made swimming underwater so crystal clear but made everything seem off color for about 5 minutes after you take them off. The latch on the back made putting it in or off smooth. Will be buying another one for my daughter and so will her cousins.
customer_reviews.author: Roman M

customer_reviews.title: Garbage: fog up, no adjustable nose piece, no good
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I was looking for something indoors at my lap pool. I will not make the mistake again of buying a brand I haven’t heard of. Poor quality, terrible seal, and they fog up!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 speedo sets before buying the Aegend goggles. Returned both Speedo sets because they were of terrible quality and the anti-fog broke down in one use. I found these and they are AMAZING. I wear heavy prescription glasses, and I can see 20/20 under the water with these goggles. No fog, no leaks, and they fit perfectly (love the clip on the back). I read other comments before buying and follow the tips posted: never touch the inside lens, rinse with non-chlorinated water both before and after use, and let air dry. I am a super happy customer and I look forward to using these for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles for tween
customer_reviews.text: I recently went in the hunt for some goggles for my tween daughter. We were looking for a pair that was larger and didn’t go into the eye sockets. Also important to her was that they were tinted dark with a mirror reflection so that when she was in the sun, her eyes would be protected and she wouldn’t have to squint all day. As soon as they were out of the package, she put them on and instantly liked the fit. No leaks and no pinching her nose. Will definitely purchase again when needed!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara H

customer_reviews.title: leaking
customer_reviews.text: I'm using the Aegend swimming cap and very happy with it, so I thought I'll give the goggles a shot. I mean why pay speedo or others more than double the price if I have other options? Well, now I know why....I got the goggles, but it's leaking and I can't see clearly. I tried to stretch it, still leaking - the leak is at the corner of the eyes, so no matter how much I stretch it, I keep getting water in my eyes, I'm disappointed. I tried to save the cost of a speedo, and now I'm out $13 and I need to buy goggles....
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: product on this page is obsolete version... there is better 'new' version on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: IMPORTANT!!! product on this page is 'obsolete' old version of the goggles... with small nose bridge that does not fit most adults (GREAT for kids!) many reviews on here are NOT for this 'clear lens' google... most images submitted are of mirrored lens. THERE IS NEWER BETTER VERSION OF THESE CLEAR LENS GOOGLES ON AMAZON!!!  i do LOVE Aegend goggles, highly recommended! just NOT the obsolete product on this page!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Perfect Fit, high quality, not flimsy, nothing else needed
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best goggles I've use that almost any price. The cups are perfectly shaped to the eyes and seal perfectly. The best of all, is that the central part connecting the two eyes is super solid. This means the 2 cups don't move and there's no flimsy little piece of plastic in the middle like almost all higher end ones which always seem to just break or fall off and never hold the way they are supposed to. I cannot recommend these enough, they seem to last forever and fit perfectly oh, I don't know what else you need.
customer_reviews.author: G. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good for normal but not large heads
customer_reviews.text: Update to my review: After I noted in my review that these goggles were not food for people with larger heads, the Aegend folks wrote me and offered to send me a new pair for free. I just received this pair of goggles. Very nice of Aegend so I'm upping this review to 5 stars. I still can't recommend these or the replacement below for people with big heads. Seems like all the companies are making one size fits all goggles.  Original review: Great goggles - airtight and easy to put on and adjust. But too small for me on the loosest setting and they crushed my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: David Froman

customer_reviews.title: Ok...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way the goggles feel and they do not leak at all, but the are NOT anti-fog. By the time I swim to one end of the pool (which is only 15m) they are already fogged. I have to take them off, rinse them in the water and put them back on. I followed all the instructions given but they still fog, BAD! I have only used them about 5 times and they have fogged since day one. I thought maybe I just got a bad pair, but I got my son a pair also and his does the same thing. Very disappointed in the "anti-fog" feature.
customer_reviews.author: Toni P

customer_reviews.title: 5yo favorite but not durable
customer_reviews.text: My 5yo daughter loved these for ability to clip them on versus pulling them over her head with long hair. Only problem is after only 3-4 months of use the clip broke and we have to toss them. With that said my lady was hard on them and so partially our fault but the plastic clip is definitely not durable. Also, the coating on the goggles is awesome but easily scratches. With all these negatives my daughter wants another pair. They come in a nice case but it is a little hard for me to get them back in the case which also broke pretty quickly let alone for a 5yo to get back in.
customer_reviews.author: Mjonesy

customer_reviews.title: Good Goggles but Still Fog
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these on a whim. I usually purchase the more well known goggle brands but I figured for the price, you really can't go wrong. Overall, I love these goggles. the snap attachment on the straps is great and very strong. The suction is very good with little to no water ever coming in. The only thing is that the goggles lost the anti-fog feature fairly quickly. I never touch the insides of the lenses and after finishing my laps, I always rinse out the goggles. To be fair, I've never had a set of goggles stay fog free but usually they last longer than 2 weeks. Still a very good pair of goggles for doing laps.
customer_reviews.author: Jun Tanega

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised... at all.
customer_reviews.text: So, it’s hard to find lap swimming equipment in Maine during winter. I found the product page attached (taken from my order history) and thought they’d be a great replacement for the goggles that I recently busted. Then I got the turd pictured in my hand which obviously looks nothing like the product page. There was a crack and significant scratch on the right lens (circled in red), and the entire left lens is all scuffed up. There was no case with the order, Just tossed in a small box. Not too mention it looks like they were used at the beach, lightly rinsed off then sent to me. Thank you for wasting our time aegend!!! ZERO STARS!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: best loved goggles in our household
customer_reviews.text: This is the first and only item I have ever purchased my 9 year old that he has loved so much that he keeps carefully in his case and always can find them. In our household, hours are lost each week helping him find everything from his left shoe to his toothbrush, his switch to his brother's headphones (he just borrowed them for a minute). We have owned innumerable goggles, and he has spent more time adjusting them etc than wearing them. Until these. The quick release, easy adjustment, ease of vision. He. Loves. these.
customer_reviews.author: 3 boys

customer_reviews.title: Look good and function as expected
customer_reviews.text: These polarized goggles provide some sun protection but the blue color I chose isn’t my favorite. I’d suggest trying a different color. These goggles are pretty easy to adjust but sometimes it does allow some water in if not set and suctioned just right to your face. The plastic back piece is different which allows a little extra motion which I don’t understand. These goggles fog up very quickly (as do many goggles)... Overall, good value for a cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, but Tight for Adult Male
customer_reviews.text: Overall, these swim goggles are OK but not spectacular. As other reviews indicated, these are designed for smaller heads. With the straps on the last notch, these swim goggles are just bit too tight for my adult male head. I would have preferred another notch or two for increased comfort. In addition, the lens have a tendency to distort the view. This is a common characteristic for most inexpensive swim goggles. If I had paid a lot more, I would have expected optically correct lens.
customer_reviews.author: JAW

customer_reviews.title: Will not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Update: Seller reached out and sent a new pair- for no additional cost. They look and work great! Thank you. Upon opening "new" item the inside of one lens was severely damaged, scratched to the point you can't see through it. I thought maybe it was a protective sticker at first glance, but it was not. I am unable to return or post a picture because my daughter toss them the trash before I could do so. After all the positive reviews, to get a crap pair was totally disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good, Then Broke
customer_reviews.text: These worked really well for my 12 year old for about 1 month before the clasp on the back broke for no reason. She took very good care of them, dried them off after use and kept them in the carrying case. They broke DURING her swim meet last night. While she did enjoy them and the looked very cool, she DID have a hard time seeing under water due to the curvature of the lens. She would get disoriented when she approached the wall. These are not the worst goggles and I wonder if them breaking was just a fluke thing, but we chose not to repurchase after they broke.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Y

customer_reviews.title: Fogging quite bad, from the first use....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these swim goggles for casual swimming. They are made of quality materials, they fit well and have not leak for me. That being said, they are fogging quite badly, it is hard to see through them in few minutes. I followed the instructions carefully, yet it does not work as advertised. I am disappointed as I have to take them off and rinse them every time I cross the pool. The issue has been there since the very first use. Giving them an extra star for the quality and fit, but overall disappointed user here.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Great Goggles for the Price
customer_reviews.text: These are a great pair of goggles for the price. I normally spend upwards of $30 dollars for a pair of goggles that fit, seal, and do not fog. I have been using these for the past month with no leaking, no fogging, and consistent suction. The straps are easily adjusted. I like the clip option that allows me to place the strap without getting stuck or moving my swim cap. I purchased two other pair with the polarized lenses, but they are a bit too dark for indoor swimming for my liking. The clear and the blue lenses work well inside.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Sagisi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect comfort and fit but poor vision underwater
customer_reviews.text: The goggles are extremely comfortable and suction power is just right. I like the strap construction as they are easy to adjust and much easier to take on and off due to the clasp. The lens is great above water and is perfectly clear. However, the vision underwater is very blurry and a little disorienting. These are easily a 5 star product if the vision underwater was clear. Update: Aegend customer support helped me out and offered to send me a different version of the goggles that have a flat lense. The flat lense is perfectly clear underwater and offers all of the same comfort as the curved lense version.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Lord

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles for the price
customer_reviews.text: These goggles work great and have yet to leak. The strap is quite comfortable and I love the clasp system that locks the strap together. This clasp makes it so much easier to put the goggles on and secure in place versus pulling the strap over your head. The eyecups create a great seal without having too much suction that pulls on your eyes. The addition of the case is a bonus that keeps the goggles from being scratched or crushed while not in use. Overall, this was a good purchase and I can see multiple more purchases as the kids and grandkids grow up.
customer_reviews.author: ChuzUThisDay

customer_reviews.title: My 6 year old LOVES these
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are wonderful! I wasnt sure if they would fit my 6 year old because they arent specifically for children but they fit GREAT. Easily adjustable with the awesome clip in the back, great for girls hair and no longer having to stretch goggles over hair to get them on. They stay clipped and the suction is awesome. No leaks! The cool part is they also fit me and my husband with adjusting them. Comes with a nice case. Already bought more!
customer_reviews.author: LittleStinker87

customer_reviews.title: Tight seal, great lenses, some fogging, some discomfort
customer_reviews.text: I love the look through the tinting on these lenses, and I love the fit and the very watertight suction! It may be because I'm hot-natured, but I do get fogging after about half an hour. Thankfully, a quick dunk in water and they're good to go again. I had another set from a different brand that ended up really getting uncomfortable in how much it dug into the bridge of my nose. These aren't as bad, but I do start to feel it push down if I have them on for very long. I don't have a particularly large or prominent nose, so it's worth mentioning.
customer_reviews.author: Trenton Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable and Leak-Free
customer_reviews.text: Finally! Swim goggles that are super comfortable, do not leak, and are crystal clear. I can’t count how many name-brand, expensive (comparatively) goggles I have ditched because they were uncomfortable and leaked. These leave no marks on my face and not a drop of water got in. Also come with a hard case to store and protect them. I would pay twice as much for these knowing how excellent they perform.
customer_reviews.author: W. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: hands down best goggles and customer support
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 pairs of these goggles for my family in the pool. Beyond comfortable, not a single leak, and no fogging. The issue I have is that we can all see perfectly clearly above the water, but under the water, like so many other reviews, these seem blurry. Very strange. I am writing because I read the customer service for this company is outstanding, so hopefully they will suggest maybe a different lens for me to try. UPDATE: the company contacted me immediately and offered to send me new goggles for the 3 that were blurry. Very courteous and generous. Buy these goggles but make sure you get the flat lens!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Proffit

customer_reviews.title: The lens fog after a few use.
customer_reviews.text: I am very dissatisfied with this product. I had high Hope's for this product when I saw it on Amazon and looked and the recommendations written. I decided to purchase this product, and the delivery was prompt and came as expected. I was excited to use my new goggles, so to the very next day I went swimming with them on. First day they worked great as recommended, no issues no fogging. On the third day of use was another story, the goggles began fogging, the lens smeared easily. When I wiped the inner lens, it scratched easily. I was very disappointed and decided to discontinue the use of this product. I wish I got my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Esan Torrington

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect, price is too!
customer_reviews.text: I have a major issue with googles and snorkeling gear leaking, and if made tighter hurting my face, then there's the glare when coming out of the water. These are great so far! I didn't give it 5 stars yet because I had to test them in the shower and sink, and the rain too ;-) It will be awhile before we have ice out here so I'll follow up when I actually get to jump in the lake! This brand is awesome! I've bought several items from them, the price is right, they are comfortable and functional every time so far :-)
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Slight blur underwater, nose bridge will poke you
customer_reviews.text: As many other reviewers have mentioned, they are a bit blurry underwater. You have to adjust your focus, since they are not flat-faced lenses. I have 20/20 vision, and typical goggles let me see perfectly fine. These do not. I'm 6'5 and have an average head size, and were not comfortable on the face. The bridge across the nose has some hard plastic that jab you, no adjustment to pull them away from between your eyes. My 5yo son likes them, tho - so I gave them to him to skip the whole return process. I like the look, like the straps, hate that they don't fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fritz

customer_reviews.title: These have to be the most uncomfortable googles I've ever ...
customer_reviews.text: These have to be the most uncomfortable googles I've ever worn. The nose piece is a very stiff plastic that didn't ever seem to flatten, causing them to pinch my nose (had a red mark all day. Will be looking to send these back unless I can find a way to adjust the nose piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great so far. i got them for not swimming... for out side
customer_reviews.text: looks like the photo. shipping was off a couple of days. I try them on. I havent used them used them. I got them for end of life stuff. I love it everything is blue. It has sunglasses in it. It seems like they work great. my eyes will be good if someone is coughing next to me. I didnt get them for swimming. they do not come from china. They r in a case too. then a bag. After the crap is over thats going down ill try them for swimming. Ill make review about how they r then too.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca mary

customer_reviews.title: Okay Goggles
customer_reviews.text: First- I really love how big these goggles are! I feel like I have a much bigger field of vision with them, which I really love! Second- I like that I can put them on over my head, or use the clasp to do them up. Third- I've only worn them a handful of times, but they already seem to be fogging up! I've tried really hard to follow the care instructions and I know the anti-fog coat will wear off eventually, but they've already started getting cloudy.
customer_reviews.author: Amandam51

customer_reviews.title: Swim goggles
customer_reviews.text: My son's current swim goggles were getting too small for him. These youth swim goggles were much easier to use than the brand that Great Wolf Lodge sells. It was a struggle to get the Great Wolf goggles to the right size. Not only were the Aegend goggles easier to adjust, they were literally a snap to put on. Because of that, we are less likely to pull hair getting these on. I really like that they come with a carrying case, so we no longer lose them in the swim bag. Since my little one enjoys sporting his new swim goggles, I call this a win.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Quite comfortable and perfect for bright sunny days
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfect for my daughter right from the box. They are great as sunglasses, too...quite comfortable. They adjust easily. We haven’t had any leakage yet but have only had them three days. The customer service team seems great and have been attentive to making sure our needs our met if we have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Not for me replacement ones they sent worked better
customer_reviews.text: I swim laps 3-5 times per week Generally goggles last 2 years or so for me These have not had good suction for me and by the second or third lap are leaking water dues to suction loss I adjust them and swim and do this the entire time When they work- they work well; but I’ve not been able to swim an entire session without readjusting them a number of times Addition I contacted the company they were great They sent me goggles more appropriate for my face Worked much better, fit better, I now use them for swimming laps
customer_reviews.author: blue blueone

customer_reviews.title: Fogs instantly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two pair of these goggles: one for my husband and one for me. We were very careful not to touch the inside lining. They fit great and look super cool. But they fog up immediately. For both of us. They’re really not even functional because of how quickly they fog. For the price I expected them to last for a summer. We bought them for vacation and used them twice and it’s just not worth the effort. I’ll purchase a pack of another brand from Costco next time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hays

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles, Great price but didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these goggles for my 5 year old this past Christmas. He started using them in March when the weather warmed up. He absolutely loved these goggles. Great price & great pair of googles, no complaints at all. I actually recommend them to several friends! However, he’s used them maybe 4 months (he honestly didn’t use them much during the pandemic) and noticed yesterday the buckle is broke! VERY disappointed that these didn’t last long at all!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Returned because they fogged up repeatedly!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the pink color of these goggles and the secure case they arrived in, but that’s it. I swim every day for an hour and wanted to replace my old goggles. These new Aegend goggles didn’t make it even half a lap before fogging up so much I could not see at all. My vision was also distorted when looking underwater but not above the water. I really wanted these goggles to work for me but instead they slowed me down. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: knitting zeal

customer_reviews.title: Best goggles ever!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 88 year old father who swims every day in his pool. He has been using Speedo Vanquisher for years but the suction around the eye socket was beginning to be a problem. He has less subcutaneous fat these days so maybe that's why Speedos were no longer good for him. While he struggled a bit to open the nice package, everything about these has been perfect! He tells me every day how much he loves his new goggles! And he looks super cute!
customer_reviews.author: P.B. of Albany, NY

customer_reviews.title: EVEN THE FISH WISH THEY HAD A PAIR!
customer_reviews.text: This item has been reviewed numerous times and I would just add my own thumbs up to an excellent, helpful, and well constructed product. This is the second one that I have ordered. This one has a tinted lens which I will use when necessary to battle the solar glare of the FL sun. As a long distance swimmer of many decades, this is the most comfortable, well fitting, and anti-fogging goggles I have ever had. It's like experiencing a good swim for the first time thanks to all its features. Bravo to Aegend Swim Goggles!!
customer_reviews.author: Critical Mass

customer_reviews.title: The BEST goggles I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: The Aegend swim goggles are the best goggles I have ever used! The lens' are crystal clear with great surrounding vision range, the fit is leakproof yet very comfortable, and the goggles are simple to adjust and use. I have never seen so much clarity underwater in my life. I have swam for over 50 years, and at least daily for the last 30 years. I have used most every goggle brand around. Aegend exceeds all the others. I recently also bought Aegend swim caps - very sturdy and comfortable, great fit - feels like it will last forever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles!  Could use a split strap.
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are really great and just what I needed. My only wish for improvement is that they had a split strap, as that is better protection against sliding. That is important to me, as I require contact lenses to swim and not swim into things, so if the goggles slip then it can mean losing a lens and that is very expensive. I would pay more for these same goggles, but with an upgraded strap. So far, so good, though! I hope that this review is helpful to you. Let me know, and happy shopping!
customer_reviews.author: Purgandi Dracointerfectorem

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for myself and my son took them!
customer_reviews.text: These goggles were so great, that when I bought them for myself my son took them and wanted them. I said he could have them if he paid me for them, and he went straight to his room and got the money to hand to me. (Usually saying that dissuades him.) He loves these goggles. They do not leak, they look cool, the case keeps them from getting scratched and can have a thread through it to be worn around the neck, etc. I found another pair for myself, but have contemplated ordering another one of these for me. :)
customer_reviews.author: TheMomReview

customer_reviews.title: This item isn’t adjustable in the nose area. Right ...
customer_reviews.text: This item isn’t adjustable in the nose area. Right after receiving the goggles, I put them on and they cut in to my nose bridge area. I tried adjusting the straps without luck. There was no way to adjust in the miss area.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre Swim Goggles
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these goggles, and while they are not bad, they are also not great. These goggles work fine for a typical swim, but they don't hold up well to rough use underwater, prone to leaking if not seated very tightly. Pros: There cheap They work Con's: The tinting is very fragile and scrapes easy, falling on the ground can leave scratches, etc in the tinting. They are sensitive to positioning, so you need to confirm a tight fit before you swim with them. They are very distorting on edges and sides due to the shape of the lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Lodebek

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit, very blurry underwater
customer_reviews.text: Update: The company contacted me directly after seeing my review. and suggested I try their flat lenses. They sent me a pair for free and I have to say I’m completely satisfied with these googles now. They are super comfortable and very clear in and out if the water. Outstanding customer service by Aegend. Fit and finish on these is great. They feel super comfortable and have a wide range of vision. The only problem, and its a bad one, they get super blurry once you go under the water. Some others have said the same thing. Not sure what the issue is, but I cannot use these.
customer_reviews.author: USAFMerlin

customer_reviews.title: Very good and comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful goggles. They feel like they aren’t even on. Very sharp looking too. I lost the instructions to them so I couldn’t quite figure out the clasp right away but they got perfect anyway. I did remember them saying to put in pool water for a bit before first use so I did that for maybe a minute. I used them in my gym pool and only complaint is that the vision is blurry so that took some time getting used to. Overall I am quite happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Vadnais

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the casual swimmer
customer_reviews.text: Received a user guide via e-mail before the goggles arrived which was extremely helpful. Purchased the dark black and in the southwest desert sun it's perfect. Focus is pretty wacky in the peripheral and not optimally clear looking forward, but clean enough to navigate...nearsighted is sharp. The only issue is the seal isn't 100% throwing off the wall sideways--leaks a little bit. Not a comfortable diver's set unless you're willing to choke your face. Well made product, looks good, and price is on point. Worth the purchase for the casual swimmer.
customer_reviews.author: byebyelabs

customer_reviews.title: Does not leak
customer_reviews.text: I lost the cheap goggles for my son and needed something fast for our trip to the beach. He is 11. He hates water in his eyes and loves to swmm under water. He was so impressed with these goggles and couldn't believe that they were so great. They suction the the eyes and do not leak. The strap is adjustable and easy to snap together. The strap did not pull or tangle in his hair. It protected him from the sun and the bright white sand, no red eyes. The container is sturdy and held his glasses while he used the goggles. These are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: TBD
customer_reviews.text: Originally these goggles were airtight and did not fog. (That lasted four times in the pool.) Now within 30 seconds they fog up and need clearing. I will say, I contacted customer service and they were EXCELLENT! They sent out a new pair immediately upon hearing my review and I am very much appreciative of their correspondence and customer service. I have only worn the new goggles once but they are airtight.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Dooling

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and fit comfortably to my face.  Great product.  Thanks
customer_reviews.text: First, I have a medical condition were-as when I go outside in the winter months, my eyes constantly drain. When the cold wind blows, my eyes drain so bad I cannot see. Yes, I'm constantly wiping my eyes. So, I bought these swim goggles which fit perfectly and are comfortable. These goggles stop the wind and since they seal tightly to my face, they lock in some of my body heat. No I can go out for my walks and see again. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Gary J.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, strap broke, repalced for free!
customer_reviews.text: My original review read as follows: "I liked these goggles; they fit my face well and were comfortable. However, the clip broke after a few months, and the design was not repairable. I tossed them and got some Speedo brand goggles." When I posted this, the company emailed me and sent me a free replacement pair of goggles! And now they are even more affordable then when I originally bought them! You can't argue with customer service like that. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Windham Hillis

customer_reviews.title: Genuinely leak-proof!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several pairs of swim goggles. all but this pair leaked. and most were also uncomfortable (in an attempt to get them not to leak, I had to over-tighten. these don't leak and are not that uncomfortable. highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: L. B. Clark

customer_reviews.title: MUCH better than most goggles, but they still leave marks around the eyes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these due to reviews stating this design didn't leave "eye rings". I used them today, and, they do. Not super bad - but my left eye not only had the ring underneath, the lid was really messed up for a while. The right eyelid was fine but had a giant ring under it for about an hr. Other than that, they are waaaay better then others I've used which made it look like my eyeballs were partially sucked from the sockets. Sort of like Arnold and his girlfriend when their helmets cracked on Mars in Total Recall. So, while these are an incredible improvement to other goggles, they still goof up the eyeball areas for a bit.
customer_reviews.author: bluetear

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles, fit well.
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are great. We bought 4 pairs in all different colors so my kids can tell theirs apart. They don’t leak, hold up well (have had them about a year now), and fit perfectly for all of us, ages 8 to adult. They do get a bit foggy and the reflective version we got makes everything look a funky color, but no one minds. 😜 The reflective lens also gets scratched easily, especially on pool decks, but it doesn’t seem to affect their function & the kids’ enjoyment of them. They’re the best goggles we’ve tried so far. We would definitely buy more of these & have recommended them to other people who have then purchased them. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: JJAC4

customer_reviews.title: Awesome above water, but defocused underwater
customer_reviews.text: If you want sun and splash protection, these are great. The design issue is that the extreme lens curvature causes defocused/blurry sight underwater once you go from air to water light ray refraction. Very bummed as these were otherwise superb. Update: Although I can't give 5 stars because the design of these original goggles is unchangeable regarding the lens curvature and underwater double-vision refraction, i have increased the rating given the superb AEGEND customer service. I was promptly sent replacement goggles of a different sport style with flat lenses and those work well underwater. I recommend folks try the AEGEND products, but be mindful of the refractive properties of curved versus flat lenses when choosing style.
customer_reviews.author: Omega Yeti

customer_reviews.title: DEAR AMAZON STORE THANK YOU FOR SO VERY MUCH SEND ME AWSOME SWIMMING GOGGLES
customer_reviews.text: THANK YOU FOR SO VERY MUCH TO GET AND THIS A BIG STEP FOR ME FOR AWSOME AMAZING SWIMMING GOGGLES AND I CAN,T NOT WAIT TO WARE THEM IN THE POOL TOMORROW IT'S LOOK BE VERY BETTER WHEN I GO UNDERWATER IN THE BOTTOM OF THE POOL AND AND I AM SO PROUD TO BE A PART OF BE A AMAZING SHOPPER ON AMAZON WEBSITE AND THANK YOU FOR SO VERY ALL YOU DO IN COVID 19 CORONAVIRUS ACROSS THE United States OF AMERICA AND HAVE A WONDERFUL SUNDAY WEEKEND AND BE SAFE and BE HEALTHY
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

product_meta.title: Aegend Swim Goggles, Swimming Goggles No Leaking Anti Fog UV Protection Triathlon Swim Goggles with Free Protection Case for Adult Men Women Youth Kids Child, Multi-Choice
feature_bullets: 【COMFORTABLE? OF COURSE!】Flexible silicone frame and improved nosepiece provide extreme comfort that never hurt your nose or leave a mark on your face.【Normal Nosepiece】
【FOG-UP?NO!】The inner surfaces of the lenses are anti-fog coated by the latest Environmental Treatment Technology which enhance the anti-fog ability of the goggles and does no harm to your face.
【LEAKING? NO!】Premium silicone material and Ergonomic design used on the goggles ensure a snug fit on different facial forms and never allows water leak in.
【CLEAR VISION? YES!】The slightly tinted lenses make for even better clarity compared with mirrored lenses. Suitable for swimming indoors or cloudy daylight conditions.

【HIGH-PERFORMENCE】Polycarbonate lenses stay strong even in the toughest conditions. Well-designed clasp make it easy to put goggles on and take off without pulling hair. *ALL OF OUR AEGEND GOGGLES HAVE 12 MONTHS GUARANTEE!

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
